title: 游戏闪退有错误报告
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-17 11:39 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Surprise! Haha. Well, this is awkward.

Time: 16-2-17 下午12:21
Description: Initializing game

java.util.UnknownFormatConversionException: Conversion = '2'
        at java.util.Formatter.checkText(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.Formatter.parse(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.Formatter.format(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.Formatter.format(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.String.format(Unknown Source)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelaunchLog.log(FMLRelaunchLog.java:62)

        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLLog.severe(FMLLog.java:45)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.LoadController.transition(LoadController.java:133)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.loadMods(Loader.java:500)
        at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.beginMinecraftLoading(FMLClientHandler.java:194)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_71384_a(Minecraft.java:495)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_99999_d(Minecraft.java:850)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)

        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:134)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:154)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Initialization --
Details:

-- System Details --

replies.author: sam3737
replies.txt_content: 你用的家具mod太偏门了，与API冲突了，删掉吧

replies.author: sam3737
replies.txt_content:
正确的说这个mod就不支持1.7。。。
它只支持1.8，装之前有必要看一看版本。
望采纳，谢谢！
